name: StyleCraft Professional Complete Bundle - Clipper, Trimmer & Shaver
shortDescription: Complete professional styling bundle with clipper, trimmer, and your choice of black or pink shaver - SAVE $319.97!
description: Get the ultimate StyleCraft professional bundle! This complete set includes the Metal Edition Instinct Clipper ($199.99), Metal Edition Trimmer ($164.99), and your choice of Metal Edition Shaver in Black or Pink ($149.99). Save over $319 on this premium combo perfect for professional barbers and stylists. All tools feature full metal construction, vector motor technology, and extended battery life.
features: Full metal construction on all tools
Vector motor technology in all devices
Choice of Black or Pink shaver
Extended battery life on all tools (120+ minutes)

specifications.setIncludes: Metal Clipper + Metal Trimmer + Metal Shaver (Black or Pink)
